summary: When noted anthropologist Dr. Ethan Powell, who left society to live in the jungle is imprisoned for murder, it's up to young psychiatrist Theo Caulder to get through to him.
cast: Anthony Hopkins|Cuba Gooding Jr.|Donald Sutherland|Maura Tierney|George Dzundza|John Ashton|John Aylward|Thomas Q. Morris|Doug Spinuzza|Paul Bates|Rex Linn|Rod McLachlan|Kurt Smildsin|Jim R. title: Instinto
